definition: gas/air/smell/weather/to make angry/to annoy/to get angry/vital energy/qi

sentences.english: He went and fetched his pneumatic drill and smashed the house down.
sentences.chinese: 他拿來了氣泵鑽，三下兩下，就把房子給鑽塌了。

sentences.english: The pump sucks air out through the valve.
sentences.chinese: 氣泵通過閥門把空氣抽出去。

sentences.english: The processes in developing a kind of reciprocating air compressor used as automobile type pump are introduced.
sentences.chinese: 介紹了一種汽車輪胎充氣泵的研製過程。

sentences.english: On this basis it carries on the structural design calculation of the new anti-gas pump.
sentences.chinese: 在此基礎上進行防氣泵的結構設計計算。

sentences.english: Installed long life heater and 24L large air pump.
sentences.chinese: 配長壽發熱芯及24L大流量氣泵。

sentences.english: Installed long life ceramic heater and 24L large air pump.
sentences.chinese: 配置長壽陶瓷發熱芯及24L大流量氣泵。
